skillAreas.title: UI/UX Design
skillAreas.copy:
I make use of tools like Figma and Adobe XD to create immersive design experiences, with a solid and consistent use of interface elements, colour schemes, spatial relationships, scale, typography, and style component patterns.

My approach takes the user's experience and the client's main goal to develop simple yet distinctive designs that seamlessly integrate into the user's journey. By focusing on the user's experience, I ensure that every design decision enhances usability and customers' engagement.

skillAreas.title: Front-End Styling
skillAreas.copy:
In an open sea of Front-End styling solutions, my stack relies mainly on Tailwind CSS, along with a variety of UI libraries such as Shadcn, Framer Motion, and Radix UI.

Additionally using CSS pre-processors like SASS (SCSS) and LESS as well as CSS Modules for building more complex UI structures and leveraging nesting, mixins, code splitting and all other valuable techniques that come with them to design modern, consistent and mobile-first experiences.

skillAreas.title: Headless CMS
skillAreas.copy:
I have strong knowledge in building headless, API-first and Cloud-native softwares to deliver exceptional results with cutting-edge and future-proof technologies. Such tools allow me to deeply integrate UX and Systems, creating outstanding full-funnel applications.

High expertise with some of the most popular CMSs out there like Sanity, Contentful and Payload (my favourite) powering blazingly fast, ultra-performant web applications backed by bold and efficient Content Management Systems.

skillAreas.title: Web Applications
skillAreas.copy:
Excellent skills in employing JSX structure to build modern reactive applications, with advanced file structure, break down of modular components and a fully typed codebase with Typescript for enhanced maintainability. Leveraging native hooks, server actions, pre-rendering, streaming and caching to ensure dynamic and interactive user experiences.

Strong understanding of data types and DOM manipulation, efficiently handling events' callbacks and JS Promises. SEO-first development prioritising semantic tags and improving readability, accessibility and optimisation. With experience building custom or native WordPress, HubSpot, and Shopify websites.

skillAreas.title: APIs & Data Handling
skillAreas.copy:
Advanced knowledge in creating, manipulating and consuming APIs for various use cases. Handling CRUD operations in RESTful and GraphQL endpoints as well as performing user authentication, login and securing private content.

Dynamically and programmatically modifying data and UIs for optimal systems performance and updating/retrieving data from SQL & NoSQL Databases such as MongoDB and Postgres.
